Note: Initials "NBT" appear in a circle near bottom right of poster. Date based on America's participation in the war. United Cigars symbol appears on left side. Orientation:  Vertical.
Description: Text says "Welcome home!  You certainly made good!" Illustration shows Uncle Sam congratualting a soldier.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I
Local Rights Statement: This material is made available for private study, scholarship, and research use. For access to the original or a high resolution reproduction, contact: Temple University Libraries, Special Collections Research Center, scrc@temple.edu, 215-204-8257.

Title: "My boy, you certainly made good!"
